account.disclaimer_full: Familiars are still retrieving data, this reading may not be complete.
account.follows.empty: This witch has thus far rejected all discipleship.
account.link_verified_on: Ownership of this link was checked on {date}
account.locked_info: This witch's profile has a ward that does not allow discipleship unless they approve a new disciple's request of passage.
account.mute_notifications: Ask your raven to no longer inform you about @{name}
account.requested: Awaiting mutual consent. Click to withdraw consent
account.unmute_notifications: Lift silence hex on notifications from @{name}
alert.unexpected.message: The familiars sense something is amiss.
alert.unexpected.title: Curses!
boost_modal.combo: You can press {combo} to skip this next time
bundle_column_error.body: The familiars were unable to load this component.
bundle_column_error.title: Network error
bundle_modal_error.message: The familiars were unable to load this component.
column_back_button.label: Back
compose_form.direct_message_warning: This cant will only be sent to the mentioned users.
compose_form.hashtag_warning: This cant won't be listed under any rune sigil as it is unlisted. Only public cants can be searched by rune sigil.
compose_form.lock_disclaimer: Your account is not {locked}. Anyone can become your disciple to view your disciple-only posts.
compose_form.sensitive.marked: Enchanted parchment is marked as sensitive
compose_form.sensitive.unmarked: Enchanged parchment is not marked as sensitive
confirmations.block.message: Are you sure you want to ward against {name}?
confirmations.delete.message: Are you sure you want to immolate this cant?
confirmations.delete_list.message: Are you sure you want to permanently immolate this tome?
confirmations.domain_block.message: Just want to make sure you're ready to ward against the entire {domain}? You will be warded against all content from that domain in the Crystal Ball or from your raven. Your disciples from that domain will be removed.
confirmations.mute.message: Are you sure you want to cast a silence hex on {name}?
confirmations.redraft.message: Are you sure you want to immolate this status and re-scribe it? You will lose all charms, channels and sigils on it.
confirmations.unfollow.message: Are you sure you want to revoke your discipleship of {name}?
embed.instructions: Embed this cant on your website by copying the enchantment below.
confirmations.reply.message: Charming now will overwrite the cant you are currently chanting. Is this acceptable to you?
embed.preview: Here is what it will look like:
emoji_button.label: Insert emoji
empty_column.blocks: There are no wards against other users
empty_column.community: The Sabbath has been silent. Cant something publicly to get the pot boiling!
empty_column.direct: You have not participated in any seances yet. When the time comes, they will show up here.
empty_column.domain_blocks: No domains are yet warded against
empty_column.favourited_statuses: You have yet to place a sigil on any cant.
empty_column.favourites: There are no sigils on this cant
empty_column.follow_requests: None have yet requested to be your disciple
empty_column.hashtag: There is nothing in this rune sigil yet.
empty_column.home: Your cauldron is empty! Visit {public} or use search to get started and meet other witches.
empty_column.list: There is nothing in this tome yet. When those whose names have been inscribed in this Tome mutter their cants, they will appear here.
empty_column.lists: You have yet to compile any tomes.
empty_column.mutes: You have yet to cast any silence hexes.
empty_column.notifications: Your raven returns empty handed. Call forth to your fellow witches!
empty_column.public: You hear naught but the whisperings of spirits. Cant something publicly, or enter into discipleship with users from other instances to fill it up
getting_started.find_friends: Rescue friends from The Accursed Bird Web Sight
getting_started.heading: Compendium
Getting started
getting_started.open_source_notice: Mastodon is open source software. You can contribute or report issues on GitHub at {github}.
hashtag.column_settings.tag_toggle: Include additional tags for this column
introduction.federation.federated.text: Public posts from other servers of the fediverse will appear in the federated timeline.
Public posts from other servers of the fediverse will appear in the crystal ball.
introduction.federation.home.headline: The cauldron
introduction.federation.home.text: Posts from people you follow will appear in your cauldron. You can follow anyone on any server!
introduction.federation.local.headline: The Sabbath
introduction.federation.local.text: Public posts from your fellow witches.live coven as you will appear in The Sabbath.
introduction.interactions.favourite.head: Sigil
introduction.interactions.favourite.text: You can place a sigil on a cant to refer to it later and let the author know that you liked it. It will also let you search for that post in the future.
introduction.interactions.reblog.text: You can share other people's cants with your disciples by channeling them.
introduction.interactions.reply.headline: Charm
introduction.interactions.reply.text: You can charm to other people's and your own cants, which will use magic to chain them together in a conversation.
introduction.welcome.headline: First steps
introduction.welcome.text: Welcome to the fediverse! In a few moments, you'll be able to broadcast messages and talk to your friends across a wide variety of servers. But this server, {domain}, is special—it hosts your profile, so remember its name.
keyboard_shortcuts.blocked: to open list of wards against other users
keyboard_shortcuts.column: to focus a cant in one of the columns
keyboard_shortcuts.down: to move down in the list
keyboard_shortcuts.favourites: list that which you have placed a sigil
keyboard_shortcuts.federated: to gaze into the crystal ball
keyboard_shortcuts.heading: Keyboard shortcuts
keyboard_shortcuts.muted: to open a list of silence hexes
keyboard_shortcuts.notifications: to open a list of incoming charms and sigils
keyboard_shortcuts.pinned: to open a list of rune-enchanted cants
keyboard_shortcuts.requests: to see list of those who request to be your disciple
keyboard_shortcuts.toot: to inscribe a brand new cant
keyboard_shortcuts.up: to move up in the list
lists.search: Search among those you are a disciple of
loading_indicator.label: The familiars are retrieving...
missing_indicator.label: Not found
missing_indicator.sublabel: This resource could not be found
mute_modal.hide_notifications: Send notifications from this user to the shadows?
notification.favourite: {name} placed a sigil on your cant
notifications.clear_confirmation: Are you sure you want to immolate your raven's offerings?
onboarding.page_five.public_timelines: The Sabbath shows public cants from everyone on {domain}. The Crystal Ball shows public cants from everyone who your fellow witches on {domain} follow. These are the Public Timelines, a great way to discover new witches, wizards, warlocks, and werewolves.
onboarding.page_four.home: The Cauldron shows cants from those you are a disciple of.
onboarding.page_four.notifications: The Raven will present your interactions with your fellow witches.
onboarding.page_one.federation: Mastodon is a network of independent servers joining up to make one larger social network. We call these servers instances.
onboarding.page_one.handle_hint: This is what you would tell your fellow witches to search for.
onboarding.page_six.apps_available: There are {apps} available for iOS, Android and other platforms.
onboarding.page_six.github: Mastodon is free open-source software. You can report bugs, request features, or contribute to the code on {github}.
onboarding.page_three.profile: Edit your reading to change your avatar, bio, and witches' insignia. There, you will also find other runes to enchant  and customize your experience.
onboarding.page_three.search: Use the search bar to find people and look at rune sigils, such as {illustration} and {introductions}. To look for a person who is not on this instance, use their full handle.
onboarding.page_two.compose: Inscribe cants from the compose column. You can send enchanted parchment, rearrange privacy runes, and add content warnings with the icons below.
privacy.direct.long: Post only to those in this seance
privacy.public.long: Post to the crystal ball for all to see
privacy.unlisted.long: Ward appearance in others' crystal balls
regeneration_indicator.label: Familiars are retrieving…
report.forward_hint: The account is from another server. Please let @anna and @fun know if there is a danger the coven should know about. Send an anonymized copy of the report there as well?
report.hint: The report will be sent to your instance moderators. You can provide an explanation of why you are reporting this account below:
search_popout.tips.full_text: Simple text returns cants you have inscribed, placed a sigil on, channeled, or have been charmed in, as well as matching usernames, witches' insignias, and rune sigils.
search_popout.tips.text: Simple text returns matching witches' insignia, usernames and rune sigils
status.admin_status: Open this status in the moderation interface
status.reblogs.empty: This cant has yet to be channeled.
ui.beforeunload: Your draft will be lost if you leave Mastodon.
upload_area.title: Drag & drop to upload
upload_button.label: Add enchanted parchment (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebM, MP4, MOV)
upload_progress.label: Familiars fetching...
